summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Northeast 90th Street from 17th Ave. Northeast to Bothell Way Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18966 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement by made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
